meta.title: From GREEN to BEANS
meta.author: Sandy Weisz and Mao Reynolds
meta.message: Thanksgiving green beans are perhaps better known as a vessel for french-friend onions, the battered onion rings you buy in a plastic container at the grocery store. These crispy casserole toppings have been around since 1904 and making healthy foods less healthy for just as long.

ladder.clue: Drop the outside letters of <> to get a kind of sound
Double the first letter of <> to get this liquid?
Swap two letters in <> to get a fruit
An <> can't actually fly with its {} (sadly)
Add a letter to the front of <> to get some predators
Change one letter in <> to get the makeup of a metaphorical hill
